## Distribucion Normal

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
my_data <- read_csv("../data/dat-ab-usos-2022.csv")
```

## Eligiendo un dia 

```{r}
library(lubridate)
my_data <- my_data %>% 
  mutate(dia_de_la_semana = lubridate::wday(DIA_TRANSPORTE, label=TRUE))
```

```{r}
my_data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(dia_de_la_semana,fill=dia_de_la_semana,CANTIDAD))+
  geom_bar(stat='identity')
```

my_data %>%
